website_summaries.verdict: Light-up wheels make these speed skates an instant favorite. Be sure to go at least a full size up when ordering, though.
pros: Lighted indoor and outdoor 54-millimeter cast urethane wheels
Lace boot closure with hook-and-loop speed strap
cons: May run at least a full size small, so keep this in mind when ordering

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect for outdoor use for a child who is learning ...
customer_reviews.text: These roller skates are working out well for my daughter. They fit as expected (she wears a size 4 shoe, we bought a size 5 skate to make them last a while). They are perfect for outdoor use for a child who is learning to skate because the wheels don't roll too easily (that is to say they roll fine, but not as easily as skates you rent at a roller skating rink). They seem to be comfortable enough as well. She likes them.
customer_reviews.author: occ.shopper

customer_reviews.title: Dont hold up well. 🙁
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these for the first time last night. After an hour of skating the color was already peeling off. She was not rough and is a moderate skater. The wheels dont even looked used, thats how much use they have got. Dissapointing they look rough after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The skates were cute but not correctly sized. I bought them for Christmas, they arrived late & they were too small. I left them in the box to return them but I forgot to return them w/in the 30 days. I sent an email explaining that they have never been worn or used & if they could at least look @ them to determine that they are in brand new shape and just exchange for a size up and they were not willing to help in any way
customer_reviews.author: Jenway

customer_reviews.title: My daughter wear these everyday and love them so much.
customer_reviews.text: These skates are beautiful, well made, lights are a nice detail that she loves. They run a little small, I suggest you go 1 or 2 sizes up so they last a little longer. My kid normally wears a size 13 in sneakers and I got her a size 2 in these skates, they are a bit roomy but she is comfortable in them. They are not as fast as other skates, but that's ok with me as she is still learning.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, well made skate.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality... These are very well make skates. The outside wheels on both skates loght up when they roll. Slow roll will make them light up. My 5 year old daughter wears a size 9, but with two pairs of socks the size 12 are just fine and that gives her a couple of years in these before upgrade needed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Kids roller skates
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely adorable! I bought them for my eight year old who wears them in the house that’s how much she loves them
customer_reviews.author: J.A. Santiago

customer_reviews.title: "Best gift ever"
customer_reviews.text: Let's put it this way, my 7 year old granddaughter said to me, " Nana I put on my skates as soon as I come home from school. I wear them all night. I even with them to dinner. It's the best present ever." They fit beautifully, she wears them at home, outside on the sidewalk and at the skating arena. They are comfortable, easy to put on and the light up wheels are a bonus for me. I can spot her easily while she's skating at the roller rink. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: judy g

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was fast but i was so dissapointed with the skates. The lights did not work at all , and this was the reason i ordered them. It was too late to send them back. I ended up buying led shoe laces and replacing the laces so my grandson would glow in the dark like the other kids at the skate party.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Kids love them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES them!!!! She had never skated before & she’s skating around the house all day long every day!
customer_reviews.author: Deb & Nic

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run small
customer_reviews.text: Skates seemed fine and my daughter really liked them but they run small she is barely into a 12 shoe and these were too tight on her feet. The next size up wasn't available in the purple color and I ended up returning these and buying a different set. For young kids I'd recommend going with an adjustable skate since they could out grow these in just a few months.
customer_reviews.author: GuyinMI

customer_reviews.title: Good for girl’s present
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I bought it for my 10yrs daughter’s birthday. She love it.
customer_reviews.author: hanara111

customer_reviews.title: Durable and when the light up it really stands out beautifully
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 7 and she got these as a Christmas gift and she absolutely LOVES them. The quality is very nice and the sizes run true!!
customer_reviews.author: NatalieMarita

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and comfortable- LOVE THEM
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES These skates! The gray ones are cheapest-still nice for girls bc wheels light up. She also says they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: SparklyWolf

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size, but the exchange for the correct size was easy. She seems to really like them and the light up feature is “way cool”.
customer_reviews.author: mason jar

customer_reviews.title: Great but wheels light up on outside only
customer_reviews.text: Love the skates but sad that the wheels only light up on the outside. Also, the wheels are a little harder to roll compared to a different pair I bought at the same time, but for my daughter, its a good thing.
customer_reviews.author: #PRAYFORSOLEIL

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I received these today in the mail. They are so cute! My granddaughter is going to love them. They are much nicer than the picture shows. I will post an update. Just on appearance I think they are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela H.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and cute skates that do indeed light up but definitely order a size or 2 bigger than what you think you'll need
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Xmas gift for our granddaughter & she was so happy she was skating with them on in the house!
customer_reviews.author: lisad

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun skates
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our daughter for her birthday. She's been wearing them for a few months now and loves them. She says they are comfortable and loves that they light up! I'd say this was a good purchase for the price, and would recommend these skates to others.
customer_reviews.author: jkm100

customer_reviews.title: Love the color!
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old is just learning how to rollerskate. He loves that they light up, and that they are light weight on his feet. I love the color and how fashionable they are, great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Love the skates. Better than hoped for
customer_reviews.text: 10 year old granddaughter loves them. She learned to skate quickly with these skates and wears them almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: martha miller

customer_reviews.title: Good skates...be careful with the laces and velcro
customer_reviews.text: Good skates but the velcro frays the laces! Sometimes he lace gets caught in the Velcro while putting them on and taking them off. Overall, my daughter loves these skates as well as the lights!
customer_reviews.author: Marie23

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my niece and she absolutely loved them! I would suggest to wear them with high socks or they will cause irritation around the ankle. But other than that she loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the purple pair for my daughter for Christmas of 2017 and now looking to purchase a new pair as she outgrew them. She loves her skates!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ireri Ray

customer_reviews.title: Want refund
customer_reviews.text: They are 2 right feet. My daughter cannot wear them. I want a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Mday

customer_reviews.title: ... for my niece for a Christmas present and they loved them, they do not take them off at ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pairs of skates one pair for my daughter and another pair for my niece for a Christmas present and they loved them, they do not take them off at all. good quality tires turn on light colors are beautiful. recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable but sizes run small!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and comfortable skates! Only the outside wheels light up. They run about two sizes too small. My daughter wears a size 1 and the size 3 fits great with a little wiggle room. They roll nice and smoothly on inside rink.
customer_reviews.author: George  Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter and she loves them. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Ferris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Skate
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 year old. They fit great. Wheels light up. He's very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Distress

customer_reviews.title: The box looked like it was in a match with Mike Tyson
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son for Christmas and the box looked like it went through a match with Mike Tyson. Luckily the skates didn't have a scratch on them but now I have to find a new box to wrap them in 😞 Love the look though.
customer_reviews.author: Porche Carter

customer_reviews.title: Delivery was FAST !!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these skates for my granddaughter as a Christmas gift so I’m not sure how they fit yet. The delivery was fast !!! The skates are super cute and seem well made. One of the rear wheels doesn’t appear to light as well as the other 3 but that’s with me pushing them around on the floor. I’ll try to remember to update after the holidays!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jacek

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner skate.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these skates. The size is true. The Wheels lite up makes it easy to spot her on the rink. She says they are comfy too.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Price and quality were good so far
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter (11yr old) loves her new skates! Price and quality were good so far...she has only had them a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great Skates
customer_reviews.text: My 7-year-old daughter loves these light up skates and uses them regularly. They turn well and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Good
customer_reviews.text: It has been shipped to Korea. Arrived earlier than I thought. The quality of the product is very good. The design is also beautiful. I was helped by reading the reviews on how to choose the size. Buy one size larger Korean size 220cm = 4, 190cm = 1 I bought two of these. I am 11 years old and 7 years old in Korea. The LED is good.
customer_reviews.author: leehyojin

customer_reviews.title: Show stopper!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! The lights look so bright at the skating rink! We got many complements!!! Skates fit to size picked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Owens

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Skates fit good. Outbound wheels lit up. Matched to Color purple on my the boot.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Quality made!
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as expected and is a great value for the cost. Nice looking, quality made skate for youth that any kid would be excited to wear. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tsachs

customer_reviews.title: so it's probably best to size up
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these same pair of skates twice for my daughter. She loves them so much that she got a new pair when she outgrew the older pair. They fit true to size, so it's probably best to size up. The outside wheels light up on both skates, she gets a ton of compliments on them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheree M

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES these!!
customer_reviews.text: These skates were for my granddaughters birthday. She couldn't wait to get to the rink with them! She has not been more happy with any gift ever!! We ordered one size larger than her shoes, and they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Brotherton

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old loves these! Lights work great, run true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Hill Fam

customer_reviews.title: I love the skates and so does my daughter
customer_reviews.text: I love the skates and so does my daughter!!!!! I recommend that you buy then 2 sizes up because they run small. I had to witch sizes from a 13 to a 2 and they are more roomy!!!!! Buy some!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Kirkland

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, only the outside wheels light up, ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, only the outside wheels light up, which was kind of a bummer, but my daughter loves them. They do not roll as smoothly as rented skates, but since she's learning, she doensn't want to go as fast anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter's 7th birthday. She loves to skate and she was so happy with these skates. The wheels light up when you roll on them. I recommend ordering a size up, they run small!
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: Great Skate!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these light up skates. They support her feet and I believe the quality and of these skates are totally worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Wellington

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter loves these roller skates! She has used them quite alot since she got them for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon J.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best
customer_reviews.text: Pacer has very good products. I am also using the same one which has good bearings and wheels. But this product does not bave good light wheels and bearings. Thats the problem only. Other wise skate is very very good.
customer_reviews.author: Milind Mahajan

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my 6 year old granddaughter she loves them. She especially likes the light up wheels on the rink! They have given her confidence in skating and she is doing well. I would definitely order them a size bigger tho, we had to return them for a bigger size
customer_reviews.author: Grammy kim

customer_reviews.title: Skates
customer_reviews.text: Skates hurt my daughter's ankle. It left a sore on one of her ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Tanesia Runnels

customer_reviews.title: Used product, not new!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the skates for Christmas and they are used already. The wheels are scuffed and dirty. The laces are shedding from being attached to the velcro from the previous wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My 7yr. Old wears a size 3 but i bought her a 5. She loves em!!!! They fit good and look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbo

customer_reviews.title: Bearing aren’t the greatest but we will replace and are pleased with the ...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these in a size bigger anticipating room for growth and they were just as expected. Bearing aren’t the greatest but we will replace and are pleased with the rest of the build of the skate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and kids love them the lights in wheels are awesome
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Lagrone

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Skates are fine but the light up wheels worked for about five minutes then they quit working.
customer_reviews.author: Kendrea Tillett

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These are amazingly good skates for the price, and the LED wheels are so much fun. Usually LED wheels are quite expensive. On these skates, only the outside wheels have lights on them, but this probably doesn't matter much. We have not tried skating outdoors, just at the rink, so far, so it isn't clear to me how well these wheels would do outside.
customer_reviews.author: opinionorama

customer_reviews.title: They are a nice staple for roller derby
customer_reviews.text: The skates fit really well. They are a nice staple for roller derby. However, the wheels themselves are a challenge to skate on. You may want to consider changing the wheels for ones that are more hospitable to the surface you inhabit the most.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loved them and went skating for her birthday. She really liked the colors and the light up wheels!
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: They helped her gain confidence at the rink - the wheels are nice and smooth
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loves these skates. She hates pink so we went with blue. They helped her gain confidence at the rink - the wheels are nice and smooth. Perfect fit and adorable design.
customer_reviews.author: MiaKai

customer_reviews.title: Light up skates
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandsons, 3 pair, they love that they light up! And they say they can't wait to take them to the skating rink and try them out!
customer_reviews.author: Cindyc

customer_reviews.title: awesome! daughter wore for her roller skate party and ...
customer_reviews.text: awesome! daughter wore for her roller skate party and everyone loved them. Lights up only on outside but still looks nice when skating.
customer_reviews.author: S.S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift Idea
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son and 9 year old daughter both have a pair! They were true to size although I went ahead and bought them a size and a half big! We love them!
customer_reviews.author: Solange

customer_reviews.title: They are now almost a year old and one of the wheels are super loose. I am told its a bearing
customer_reviews.text: Bought these skates in January 2015. My daughter loves them! However, she is a seasoned skater and does a few dance tricks etc at the local roller rink. They are now almost a year old and one of the wheels are super loose. I am told its a bearing. I would have hoped a 9 year old would grow out of them before she wore out the bearings.
customer_reviews.author: dawn fridas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: My girls loves these skates. Especially at night when the wheels light up

customer_reviews.title: love these
customer_reviews.text: We get so many compliments over it and the light up feature always makes it easy to find my kid on the skating rink:)

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em
customer_reviews.text: My 8yo loves these and the flashing lights on the outer wheels are cool.

customer_reviews.title: It moves smoothly and its perfect for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves the skates, she wears it in the house and never takes it off. It moves smoothly and its perfect for a beginner. However, the lights of the wheel doesn't light up as much as I want it to light up.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves them comfortable and is great on sidewalk and skate rink

customer_reviews.title: and the light up wheels are so fun!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these....they work well outside as well...and the light up wheels are so fun!

customer_reviews.title: They light up as she rolls along and they are pretty with pink and purple
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who is four loves her new roller skates. They light up as she rolls along and they are pretty with pink and purple. They fit snugly, rolls smoothly and the pink brake comes in handy...great purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Smells of smoke
customer_reviews.text: Horribly strong smell of smoke are on the skates. We have febreezed and aired out and are still stuck with nasty smoke smell.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Made my 9 year old niece's day!! She loves them & they fit perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Adorable skates for 1st time skater!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable skates...only issue is that they run a little narrow.

customer_reviews.title: Birthday gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece for her 7th birthday. She wears a size 2 so I bought her a 3 as the reviews suggested and they fit her great with a tiny bit of room to grow. I skate myself in a roller derby league and I would definitely recommend these for beginner skates. They seem to be well made and the lights are darling! She didn't want to take them off once she put them on.
customer_reviews.author: H. La Bouff

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter love them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our granddaughter, she loved them and they are working out very well I read the reviews and they suggested buying a larger size, we did and they fit great a little grow room. delivery was prompt.

customer_reviews.title: Only the outside lights work as stated
customer_reviews.text: My daughter live them. Got here fast and lights work good so far.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Perfect in every way. My 5 year old loved them and is already getting the hang of it! Good product for the price

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Girlie
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute. My 6yr olds birthday present. She loves the light up wheels.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves hers and is skating EVERYWHERE! Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: light up skates
customer_reviews.text: I got them for my granddaughter and she loves them.

customer_reviews.text: Order size or two up. My kids wear size 1 and 2 with room but these are cut very small ;(

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them fast. My daughter loves them. She is still learning.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these for her birthday and loves them! They are cute and well constructed.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. Great quality and the light up wheels are the best part!!! So glad With this product thank you 😊

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves the roller skates, and they seem to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Darlington

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are awesome! My girls love them. Now all four of them want matching skates. Great quality. The only thing is that the laces are easily frayed with getting stuck in the velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for outside skating
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. My daughter r eceived these for Christmas and she hasn't taken them off yet. The wheels are fun for skating in the dark. We are using ours as outdoor skates and they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loved these!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears size 13- I bought these in a size 2. They fit with some growing room. Wheels are smooth and quiet, they also light up really cool in the dark. Can't wait to take her to a roller rink with these!
customer_reviews.author: C. Cole

customer_reviews.title: The Best Gift of 2013
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old daughter loves these skates. She hasn't taken them off since Christmas. The weather hasn't been the greatest - but that hasn't stopped her. She skates in the kitchen like she's on concrete. Last night she skated in the dark and really sped off as she watched the wheels light up. I have to admit-it was cool! This was the best X-mas gift of 2013.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Williams-Gallman

customer_reviews.title: I recommend to buy one or two size more than your actual size. Particularly I changed for 2 size more and was great.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing skates my daughter loves it. It was a little small but I changed and the service was wonderful. My daughter size is 13 then I finally got it size 4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped quickly. Only issue we’ve had with the skates is the stitches in the Velcro strap broke. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: 5 Star Skates for sure!
customer_reviews.text: These light up skates are perfect for any young child 5 and up. Absolutely love that I found these skates for my son... Lots of outdoor fun!
customer_reviews.author: Denise C.

customer_reviews.title: Pacer Comet Kids Light Up Roller Skates
customer_reviews.text: These were a great birthday gift for my 9 year old - a nice solid well-made skate that is easy for her to get on by herself. Our favorite feature of course is the light-up wheels which were much admired at the skating rink. The wheels had a bit of a tackiness to them right out of the box but once they had been used a bit that disappeared and they work great. We ordered 1 size up and they fit perfect - just a little bit of extra room at the end for her to grow into but not so much her foot is sliding around.
customer_reviews.author: N. Cousino

customer_reviews.title: but I have a desire that the bearings be chosen with a better rating.
customer_reviews.text: There is no problem with the product, but I have a desire that the bearings be chosen with a better rating.!!!
customer_reviews.author: choi.jun.sung

customer_reviews.title: Not that good
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made, they scuff and wear down very quickly
customer_reviews.author: Carmin DeRose

customer_reviews.title: These skates are so much fun.
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter and nieces love them! Have had no problems with wheels yet, but we don't skate very fast yet. Laces get a bit tangled in the Velcro strap, but the fit is comfortable. I too purchased one size up. Delivery was pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great first skates!
customer_reviews.text: These were a Christmas gift for my 5 year old granddaughter. She loved the color and the lights. Price was right too.
customer_reviews.author: grandpam

customer_reviews.title: so far very nice.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these skates. They are much more comfortable then the rental skates, and they light up so he gets a kick out of them. He wore them the whole first day he got them all over the house, and tried the next day also.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cox

product_meta.title: Pacer Comet Children's Roller Skate
product_meta.description: Illuminate when you skate! The Comet Features two outer wheels on each skate that light up when you roll. No batteries needed! Grippy, bouncy urethane wheels work great indoors or outdoors. Lightweight, durable boot is stylish and comfy. Comet fits true to U.S. children's shoe sizes.
feature_bullets: BOOTS - Deluxe sport profile design with strap & lace closure boot. Padded collar for extra comfort.
PLATES - Lightweight Torsion Beam chassis. Lighter plates mean you can skate longer without getting tired.
WHEELS - LIGHTED Indoor / Outdoor - 54mm Cast urethane wheels - Four outside are lighted & Four inside are regular wheels.
BEARINGS - 608ZB Excellerator bearings. Sealed and greased for a longer life.
TOE STOPS - Fixed toe stops that match the wheel colors.
